name: Paleo Life
description:
Recent Update - 04/09/20 (12:52 PM EST) See Devlog for details

Paleo Life ©

Experience a day in the life of a caveman. Choose your gender. Gather and hunt for food.  Avoid becoming a meal for other creatures . Keep your fire burning!

Check our Twitter page for game play videos and pics of this game and others from Dubya Studios.

**Game will be updated frequently while development wraps up.
